001package edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.view;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.content.res.Resources;
005import android.util.AttributeSet;
006import android.view.LayoutInflater;
007import android.view.View;
008import android.view.ViewGroup;
009import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
010import android.widget.GridView;
011import android.widget.ImageView;
012import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
013import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.R;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Block;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Block.ShapeType;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Field;
018
019public class PlayingFieldView extends GridView {
020
021  private Field playingField;
022
023  public PlayingFieldView(Context context) {
024    super(context);
025  }
026
027  public PlayingFieldView(Context context, AttributeSet attrs) {
028    super(context, attrs);
029  }
030
031  public PlayingFieldView(Context context, AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr) {
032    super(context, attrs, defStyleAttr);
033  }
034
035  public PlayingFieldView(Context context, AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr, int defStyleRes) {
036    super(context, attrs, defStyleAttr, defStyleRes);
037  }
038
039  public Field getPlayingField() {
040    return playingField;
041  }
042
043  public void setPlayingField(Field playingField) {
044    if (playingField != null) {
045      this.playingField = playingField;
046      int heightInBricks = playingField.getHeight() - playingField.getBufferHeight();
047      int widthInBricks = playingField.getWidth();
048      int maxBrickHeight = getHeight() / heightInBricks;
049      int maxBrickWidth = getWidth() / widthInBricks;
050      ViewGroup.LayoutParams params = getLayoutParams();
051      int columnSize = Math.min(maxBrickHeight, maxBrickWidth);
052      params.height = columnSize * heightInBricks;
053      params.width = columnSize * widthInBricks;
054      setLayoutParams(params);
055      setNumColumns(widthInBricks);
056      setAdapter(new Adapter(getContext()));
057    }
058  }
059
060  private class Adapter extends ArrayAdapter<ShapeType> {
061
062    private final LayoutInflater inflater;
063    private final int bufferHeight;
064    private final int visibleHeight;
065    private final int width;
066    private final int currentBlockOpacity;
067    private final int ghostBlockOpacity;
068
069    public Adapter(@NonNull Context context) {
070      super(context, R.layout.item_playing_field);
071      inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
072      bufferHeight = playingField.getBufferHeight();
073      visibleHeight = playingField.getHeight() - bufferHeight;
074      width = playingField.getWidth();
075      Resources res = context.getResources();
076      currentBlockOpacity = res.getInteger(R.integer.current_block_opacity);
077      ghostBlockOpacity = res.getInteger(R.integer.ghost_block_opacity);
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public int getCount() {
082      return visibleHeight * width;
083    }
084
085    @NonNull
086    @Override
087    public View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent) {
088      int col = position % width;
089      int row = position / width + bufferHeight;
090      Block currentBlock = playingField.getCurrentBlock();
091      Block ghostBlock = playingField.getGhostBlock();
092      ShapeType shapeType;
093      int alpha = currentBlockOpacity;
094      if (currentBlock != null && isInBlock(currentBlock, row, col)) {
095        shapeType = currentBlock.getType();
096      } else if (ghostBlock != null && isInBlock(ghostBlock, row, col)) {
097        shapeType = ghostBlock.getType();
098        alpha = ghostBlockOpacity;
099      } else {
100        shapeType = playingField.get(row, col);
101      }
102      ImageView view = (ImageView) ((convertView != null)
103          ? convertView
104          : inflater.inflate(R.layout.item_playing_field, parent, false));
105      view.getDrawable().setLevel(
106          (shapeType == null) ? ShapeType.values().length : shapeType.ordinal());
107      view.getDrawable().setAlpha(alpha);
108      return view;
109    }
110
111    private boolean isInBlock(Block block, int row, int col) {
112      int blockTop = block.getTopRow();
113      int blockLeft = block.getLeftColumn();
114      int blockHeight = block.getLastOccupiedRow() + 1;
115      int blockWidth = block.getWidth();
116      return row >= blockTop && row < blockTop + blockHeight
117          && col >= blockLeft && col < blockLeft + blockWidth
118          && block.isOccupied(row - blockTop, col - blockLeft);
119    }
120  }
121
122}
